tag_list: soft, lightlogger, monitoring, software, free, antivirus, remove, spyware, keyloggers, trojans, downloaders, anticheat, cheat, detector
overview: Heavenward is a computer security company in 2007, we create this site for distributing our own software creations. At the time, our goal was to create useful applications that everyone could use as freeware, and my first software was a simple but very versatile keylogger called LightLogger. We now offer a number of applications, including LightLogger (no longer free!), that I continue to improve in our free time. We offer Computer and Internet Monitoring Software. Monitor home PC activity, including keystrokes, screenshots and websites visited.
